turns.userPrompt:
Add file attachment support for tasks:
- Backend: Set up file upload with Multer (or similar)
- Store files locally in uploads/ directory (or S3 if preferred)
- Create attachments table (id, task_id, filename, file_url, uploaded_by, created_at)
- API: POST /tasks/:id/attachments, GET /tasks/:id/attachments, DELETE /attachments/:id
- Frontend: File upload dropzone in task detail modal
- Display attached files with download/delete options
- Show attachment count badge on task cards
